    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(User user,
              java.lang.String nickname,
              PrivateObjectiveCard card)
        Constructor: creates a new Player based on given user, nickname and private objective card.
        Parameters:
        user - the user playing in this game
        nickname - the nickname the user choose before entering the game
        card - the private objective card assigned randomly to the player

    • Method Detail

      • setWindowPattern

        public void setWindowPattern(WindowPattern windowPattern)
        Assign to the player the given windowpattern. Can be assigned only one time at all.
        Parameters:
        windowPattern - the windowpattern to be assigned to this player

      • getPrivateObjectiveCard

        public PrivateObjectiveCard getPrivateObjectiveCard()
        Returns the private objective card of the player.
        Returns:
        the private objective card of the player

      • decreaseTokens

        public boolean decreaseTokens(int quantity)
        Decrease favorTokens of the given quantity. Return false if not enough tokens left.
        Parameters:
        quantity - how much favorTokens must be decreased
        Returns:
        true if the action succeeded, false if not (not enough tokens left)

      • getWindowPattern

        public WindowPattern getWindowPattern()
        Returns the windowpattern of the player.
        Returns:
        the windowpattern of the player

      • canUseToolCard

        public boolean canUseToolCard(ToolCard toolCard)
        Checks if the given toolcard can be used comparing favorTokens with ToolCard.getNeededTokens() .
        Parameters:
        toolCard - the toolcard to check if it's usable or not
        Returns:
        true if the given toolcard can be used, false if not

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Returns the user.
